be.accessDenied: Access denied! Please refresh the page and try again.

fe.signInDescription: Enter your username and password to sign in to your account.

be.signInFailed: Sign in failed! Please try again later.
be.signOutSuccess: You need to sign back in.
be.signOutFailed: Sign out failed! Please try again later.
be.userFetchFailed: Failed to load user information! Please try again later.

fe.title: Home
fe.totalTransactionsTooltip: Total number of transactions (both income and expenses) you've made this month. Helps track your transaction frequency.
fe.highestTransactionTooltip: Transaction with the highest value this month (could be income or expense). Helps identify unusual large amounts.
fe.lowestTransactionTooltip: Transaction with the lowest value this month (could be income or expense). Helps identify frequent small expenses.
fe.avgExpenseTooltip: Average amount per expense transaction (Total expenses / Number of expense transactions). Helps you understand your average spending scale.
fe.savingsRateTooltip: Percentage of money you save compared to income ((Income - Expenses) / Income Ã— 100%). Higher is better, should maintain above 20%.
fe.popularCategoryTooltip: Category with the highest total amount this month. Helps you identify your biggest spending area or income source.

userDataError.title: UNABLE TO LOAD USER DATA
userDataError.description: An error occurred while loading user information! Please try again later.

transactionsDataError.title: UNABLE TO LOAD TRANSACTIONS DATA
transactionsDataError.description: An error occurred while loading transactions! Please try again later.

categoriesDataError.title: UNABLE TO LOAD CATEGORIES DATA
categoriesDataError.description: An error occurred while loading categories! Please try again later.

fe.title: Statistics
fe.description: Analyze your financial data with detailed statistics and insights.

fe.title: Transactions
fe.description: Manage your income and expenses to track your personal finances.
fe.addTransactionDescription: Add your income or expenses to track your personal finances.
fe.deleteTransactionDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the transaction "{description}"? This action cannot be undone.

be.transactionAddFailed: Failed to add transaction! Please try again later.
be.transactionUpdateFailed: Failed to update transaction! Please try again later.
be.transactionDeleteFailed: Failed to delete transaction! Please try again later.
be.transactionNotFoundOrNoPermission: Transaction not found or you don't have permission to edit!
be.transactionNotFoundOrNoPermissionDelete: Transaction not found or you don't have permission to delete!
be.transactionFetchFailed: Failed to load transactions! Please try again later.

fe.title: Categories
fe.description: Manage custom categories for your transactions.
fe.addCategoryDescription: Add a custom category for your transactions.
fe.noCategoriesDescription: You haven't created any custom categories yet. Add your first category!
fe.noCategoriesFiltered: No categories match your current filters.
fe.deleteCategoryDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{label}"? This action cannot be undone.

be.categoryAddFailed: Failed to add category! Please try again later.
be.categoryUpdateFailed: Failed to update category! Please try again later.
be.categoryDeleteFailed: Failed to delete category! Please try again later.
be.categoryExists: Category with this name already exists!
be.categoryKeyError: Error creating category key. Please try again.
be.categoryNotFoundOrNoPermission: Category not found or you don't have permission to edit!
be.categoryNotFoundOrNoPermissionDelete: Category not found or you don't have permission to delete!
be.categoryInUseWithCount: Cannot delete category. There are {count} transactions using this category. Please delete those transactions first.
be.categoryFetchFailed: Failed to load custom categories! Please try again later.

fe.title: Settings
fe.appearanceDescription: Choose the display theme for the application.
fe.languageDescription: Choose the language for the application.

be.passwordUpdateFailed: Password update failed! Please try again later.
be.languageUpdateFailed: Failed to update language! Please try again later.

signIn.passwordRequired: Password must be at least 8 characters long, including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.

password.newPasswordRequired: New password must be at least 8 characters long, including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.

category.categoryNameMaxLength: Category name must not exceed 50 characters.
